T02D1789:8b-0: @8b * // ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa'i rgyud las 'byung ba'i rgyan bdun rnam par dgrol ba bzhugs /
T02D1789:8b-3: #/ // / bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1789:8b-4: dngos kun rang bzhin stong bdag nyid ;
T02D1789:8b-5: / dngos po kun gyi ngo bo nyid //
T02D1789:8b-6: thams cad bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1789:8b-7: gnyis med de la rab tu 'dud //
T02D1789:8b-8: ye shes kun btus rgyud las ni //
T02D1789:8b-9: rnal 'byor bla ma'i rgyud dgrol lugs //
T02D1789:8b-10: rgyan ni bdun po gang yin pa //
T02D1789:9a-2: rnal 'byor rgyud tshul gang la yang //
T02D1789:9a-3: rgyud tshul rnam pa gsum du snang //
T02D1789:9a-4: rgyu yi rgyud dang thabs kyi rgyud //
T02D1789:9a-5: 'bras bu'i rgyud ces mkhas pas bshad //
T02D1789:9a-6: rgyud la gang zag mtha' yas kyang //
T02D1789:9a-7: cung zad dbye na rnam pa lnga ;
T02D1789:9a-10: de la bsdus pa rnam gnyis te //
T02D1789:9a-11: tshogs dang slob ma'i gang zag go //
T02D1789:9a-12: de dag re re dag la yang //
T02D1789:9a-13: blo ni rab 'bring tha ma gsum //
T02D1789:9a-14: chos smra ba dang sgrub byed pa'o //
T02D1789:9a-15: rgyan ni lnga pa drug par bshad //
T02D1789:9a-16: thabs kyi rgyud las rnam pa gnyis //
T02D1789:9a-17: brda dang don du mkhas bas bshad //
T02D1789:9a-18: de 'dzin byed pa smra byed dang //
T02D1789:9a-19: sgrub par byed pa kho na yin //
T02D1789:9a-20: gleng bslang lnga dang mtha' drug rgyan //
T02D1789:9a-21: brda yi rgyud la 'jug pa yin //
T02D1789:9a-22: rigs pa rnam bzhi bshad pa bzhi //
T02D1789:9a-23: bden gnyis nges pa'i rgyan dag ni //
T02D1789:9a-24: don la 'jug pa'i rgyan zhes bya'o //
T02D1789:9a-25: gleng bslad dbye na rnam pa lnga //
T02D1789:9a-26: cung zad rim par dbye bar bya //
T02D1789:9a-27: brda yi rgyud du gsungs pa yi //
T02D1789:9a-28: ming dang ched dang byed pa po //
T02D1789:9a-29: tshad dag dang ni dgos pa'o //
T02D1789:9a-30: ming ni khri sum stong phrag bzhi //
T02D1789:9a-31: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud du grangs //
T02D1789:9a-32: ka nas ya yi bar du ni //
T02D1789:9a-33: nyi shu rtsa drug ming gi mtha'o //
T02D1789:9a-34: de tsam cung zad dbye ba ste //
T02D1789:9a-35: rgyas par dbye na grangs med do //
T02D1789:9a-36: bsdus pa'i rtsa ba yi ge gsum //
T02D1789:9a-37: gsungs pa sku gsung thugs zhes gsungs //
T02D1789:9a-38: ched ni gdul bya rgya mtsho snyed //
T02D1789:9a-39: brjod mi lang ba'i don du gsungs //
T02D1789:9a-40: bsdus na skye bo 'dod chags can //
T02D1789:9a-41: 'dod khams dbang du gsungs pa yin //
T02D1789:9a-42: byed pa po ni rdo rje sems //
T02D1789:9a-43: sangs rgyas drug pa de kho na //
T02D1789:9a-44: tshad ni dpal ldan gsang 'dus kyi //
T02D1789:9a-45: le'u dang cho ga dum bu dang //
T02D1789:9a-46: rim pa bshad pa rnam pa bzhi //
T02D1789:9a-47: le'u ni rnam pa bcu bdun te //
T02D1789:9a-48: cho ga nyi shur mkhas pas bshad //
T02D1789:9a-49: dum bu phyi ma'i rgyud dang ni //
T02D1789:9a-50: bshad pa'i rgyud rnams grags pa yin //
T02D1789:9b-0: bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i sgrub @9b thabs dang //
T02D1789:9b-1: srid pa skye 'chi'i rim pa yi //
T02D1789:9b-2: dbye ba brjod pa rim pa yin //
T02D1789:9b-3: thun mong mchog dang rnam bzhi las //
T02D1789:9b-4: bdag gzhan don byas dgos pa'o //
T02D1789:9b-5: rgyud gzhan la yang de bzhin no //
T02D1789:9b-6: mtha' rnam drug ces bya ba yang //
T02D1789:9b-7: dgongs dang dgongs min drang dang nges //
T02D1789:9b-8: ji bzhin sgra dang sgra min no //
T02D1789:9b-9: 'dod chags ma yin chags bral min //
T02D1789:9b-10: dbu mar mi dmigs la sogs pa'i //
T02D1789:9b-11: rdo rje'i tshig ni dgongs bshad pa'o //
T02D1789:9b-12: stong pa bdag med 'od gsal ba //
T02D1789:9b-13: zhes sogs tshig ni dgongs pa min //
T02D1789:9b-14: ga pur tsandna rdo rje pad ;
T02D1789:9b-15: / ces sogs tshig ni drang ba'i don //
T02D1789:9b-16: khu ba khrag dang btsun mo sogs //
T02D1789:9b-17: rdo rje'i tshig ni nges pa'i don //
T02D1789:9b-18: dkyil 'khor mchod sbyin la sogs pa //
T02D1789:9b-19: don gsal gsungs pa ji bzhin sgra //
T02D1789:9b-20: ko ta ksha sogs ji bzhin min //
T02D1789:9b-21: de tsam zhig ni brda rgyud rgyan //
T02D1789:9b-22: brda yis mtshon nas don la ni //
T02D1789:9b-23: 'jug byed de yang thabs kyi rgyud //
T02D1789:9b-24: don ni rigs pa bzhir bshad pa //
T02D1789:9b-25: rgyud dang gleng gzhi nges tshig rgyu //
T02D1789:9b-26: chags bral chags bcas dbang du'o //
T02D1789:9b-28: khyim nas byung ba bya ba med //
T02D1789:9b-29: 'dul dang sdom pa la ltos pa'o //
T02D1789:9b-31: chags bral rigs pa bzhir 'dod do //
T02D1789:9b-32: phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga //
T02D1789:9b-33: dbang po lnga dang nyon mongs lnga //
T02D1789:9b-34: rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas lnga ru 'dod //
T02D1789:9b-36: ltos pa rang gi mtshan ma la'o //
T02D1789:9b-37: spros bcas la sogs spyod pa yi //
T02D1789:9b-39: chags bcas rigs pa bzhir 'dod do //
T02D1789:9b-40: bshad gzhi yig don spyi yi don //
T02D1789:9b-41: sbas pa'i don dang mthar thug pa'o //
T02D1789:9b-42: sgra yi bkod pa bstan bcos bzhin //
T02D1789:9b-43: don gyis bkod pa'i yi ge'i don //
T02D1789:9b-44: tshig gcig 'bras bu bsnyen mthong ba //
T02D1789:9b-45: yul ring 'jug pa'i blo bzlog ste //
T02D1789:9b-46: 'bras don gzhan don bskyed rim la //
T02D1789:9b-47: sbyor ba dang po la sogs pa //
T02D1789:9b-48: rgyas bshad don ni spyi yi don //
T02D1789:9b-49: chags bcas spyod pa don yod dang //
T02D1789:10a-2: snang gsum rtogs pas don yod pa'i //
T02D1789:10a-3: mi bstan sbas don rnam pa gsum //
T02D1789:10a-4: yang dag don nyid ston pa dang //
T02D1789:10a-5: don dam la bden gnyis med thob //
T02D1789:10a-7: mthar thug pa ni yin par gsungs //
T02D1789:10a-8: sgyu ma'i dper byas bcu gnyis kyis //
T02D1789:10a-9: kun rdzob nges par shes par bya //
T02D1789:10a-10: thams cad stong pa 'od gsal ba //
T02D1789:10a-11: don dam du ni gang bstan pa //
T02D1789:10a-12: rdzogs ba sgrub par byed pa ste //
T02D1789:10a-13: don gyi rgyud du bstan pa yin //
T02D1789:10a-14: 'bras bu'i rgyud ni rnam pa gsum //
T02D1789:10a-15: thun mong mchog dang gnyi ga yi //
T02D1789:10a-16: 'bras bur rgyal ba dam pas gsungs //
T02D1789:10a-17: thun mong grub pa brgyad la sogs //
T02D1789:10a-18: bskyed pa'i rim ba'i nus pa yin //
T02D1789:10a-19: mchog ni sangs rgyas go 'phang ste //
T02D1789:10a-20: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i 'bras bu yin //
T02D1789:10a-21: zung 'jug rim pa mthar phyin na //
T02D1789:10a-22: gnyi ga'i dngos grub rdzogs pa yin //
T02D1789:10a-23: thun mong thob la mchog ma yin //
T02D1789:10a-24: mchog la thun mong yod ma yin //
T02D1789:10a-26: de dag gnyis su yod ma yin //
T02D1789:10a-28: 'bras bu rgyu la rag las te //
T02D1789:10a-29: sa bon lta bu yin pas na //
T02D1789:10a-30: rgyu yi gang zag rnam pa lnga /
T02D1789:10a-31: spang blang bye brag shes par bya //
T02D1789:10a-32: de nas rim par dbang blangs te //
T02D1789:10a-33: thabs kyi rgyud la 'jug par bya //
T02D1789:10a-34: dang po nyan pa'i shes rab kyis //
T02D1789:10a-35: tshig gi rgyud la thos pa bskyed //
T02D1789:10a-36: de nas bsams pa'i shes rab kyis //
T02D1789:10a-37: tshig dang don du 'brel pa bslab //
T02D1789:10a-38: de nas bsgom pa'i blo rtsal gyis //
T02D1789:10a-39: dang por bskyed pa'i rim pa bslab //
T02D1789:10a-40: de rjes rdzogs pa mthar dbyung ste //
T02D1789:10a-41: kha spubs [*sbubs] rdol dang dug can gyi //
T02D1789:10a-42: skyon rnams spangs te rgyun gnas na //
T02D1789:10a-43: chu lud rkyen gyis 'bras bskyed bzhin //
T02D1789:10a-44: 'bras bu mngon gyur the tshom med //
T02D1789:10a-45: rgyud gsum rgyan bdun sbyor ba'i lde mig gis //
T02D1789:10a-46: gsang 'dus la sogs rgyud kyi sgo phye nas //
T02D1789:10a-47: kun la dgos pa'i 'bras bu rin po che //
T02D1789:10a-48: rnal 'byor rnams kyi rgyud la thob par shog / rgyan bdun rnam par dgrol ba zhes bya ba /
T02D1789:10a-49: aa ts'a rya shraddh'a ga ra wa rmas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
